participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and caring, she enjoys storytelling and has a nurturing side as a mother.
participant_1.background: I have a laptop that I use to do my schoolwork and write my stories. I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery. I'm a busy mom of two who is trying to find a healthy way to lose weight. I like to go on walks with my dog, because he's always excited to explore. I had to get a job early as a child.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Supportive and active, he values family and fitness, and tends to avoid high-risk situations.
participant_2.background: I care for my family by supporting them and doing my best to take care of their needs. I tried my hand at gambling, but I didn't have the stomach for it. I’m allergic to milk. I am mixed with Puerto Rican and Chinese. I work out to look good.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm getting ready to go for a run. How about you?
I'm doing well! Just finished writing a story for my class.
Oh cool! What's the story about?
It's about a woman who is trying to find her way back to her family after she's been kidnapped.
Oh that sounds exciting! I love suspenseful movies and books.
Me too! I'm always on the edge of my seat when I'm reading or watching a suspenseful story.
I know what you mean! I can't help but keep turning the pages or watching the movie until I find out what happens.
Me too! I'm glad I'm not the only one who feels that way.
Yeah, it's nice to know that there are other people who enjoy the same things I do.
Definitely! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about my hobbies.
Me too! I love meeting new people and learning about their interests.
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great run!
